pixi.core.textures.RenderTexture

type
class
extends
Texture
metadata
:native
"PIXI.RenderTexture"

Constructor

new(renderer : Dynamic, width : Float, height : Float, scaleMode : Int, resolution : Float)
parameters
renderer {CanvasRenderer|WebGLRenderer} The renderer used for this RenderTexture
[width=100] {number} The width of the render texture
[height=100] {number} The height of the render texture
[scaleMode] {number} See {@link SCALE_MODES} for possible values
[resolution=1] {number} The resolution of the texture being generated
A RenderTexture is a special texture that allows any Pixi display object to be rendered to it. __Hint__: All DisplayObjects (i.e. Sprites) that render to a RenderTexture should be preloaded otherwise black rectangles will be drawn instead. A RenderTexture takes a snapshot of any Display Object given to its render method. The position and rotation of the given Display Objects is ignored. For example: ```js var renderTexture = new PIXI.RenderTexture(800, 600); var sprite = PIXI.Sprite.fromImage("spinObj_01.png"); sprite.position.x = 800/2; sprite.position.y = 600/2; sprite.anchor.x = 0.5; sprite.anchor.y = 0.5; renderTexture.render(sprite); ``` The Sprite in this case will be rendered to a position of 0,0. To render this sprite at its actual position a Container should be used: ```js var doc = new Container(); doc.addChild(sprite); renderTexture.render(doc); // Renders to center of renderTexture ```

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

baseTexture : BaseTexture

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The base texture that this texture uses.

crop : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
This is the area of the BaseTexture image to actually copy to the Canvas / WebGL when rendering, irrespective of the actual frame size or placement (which can be influenced by trimmed texture atlases)

frame : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The frame specifies the region of the base texture that this texture uses

height : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The height of the Texture in pixels.

noFrame : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
Does this Texture have any frame data assigned to it?

renderer : Dynamic

The renderer this RenderTexture uses. A RenderTexture can only belong to one renderer at the moment if its webGL.

requiresUpdate : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
This will let a renderer know that a texture has been updated (used mainly for webGL uv updates)

resolution : Float

The Resolution of the texture.

rotation : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The rotation value of the texture, copied to a sprite when assigned to it.

spritePivot : pixi.core.math.Point

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The pivot point to used for a sprite this texture belongs to.

trim : pixi.core.math.shapes.Rectangle

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The texture trim data.

valid : Bool

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
This will let the renderer know if the texture is valid. If it's not then it cannot be rendered.

width : Float

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
The width of the Texture in pixels.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

clear() : Void

Clears the RenderTexture.

destroy(?destroyBase : Bool) : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
parameters
destroyBase {Bool} Whether to destroy the base texture as well
Destroys this texture

getBase64() : String

returns
{String} A base64 encoded string of the texture.
Will return a a base64 encoded string of this texture. It works by calling RenderTexture.getCanvas and then running toDataURL on that.

getCanvas() : js.html.CanvasElement

returns
{HTMLCanvasElement} A Canvas element with the texture rendered on.
Creates a Canvas element, renders this RenderTexture to it and then returns it.

getImage() : js.html.Image

returns
{Image}
Will return a HTML Image of the texture

resize(width : Float, height : Float, updateBase : Bool) : Void

parameters
width {Float} The width to resize to.
height {Float} The height to resize to.
updateBase {Bool} Should the baseTexture.width and height values be resized as well?
Resizes the RenderTexture.

update() : Void

inherited from pixi.core.textures.Texture
Updates this texture on the gpu.
